Photon.Pun.Demo.PunBasics.LoaderAnime Class Reference Photon.Pun.Demo.PunBasics.LoaderAnime
Simple behaviour to animate particles around to create a typical "Ajax Loader".

Collaboration diagram for Photon.Pun.Demo.PunBasics.LoaderAnime:

void StartLoaderAnimation ()
Starts the loader animation.
void StopLoaderAnimation ()
Stops the loader animation.
Public Attributes
float speed = 180f
float radius = 1f
GameObject particles
Detailed Description
Simple behaviour to animate particles around to create a typical "Ajax Loader".
this is actually very important to visual inform the user that something is happening or better say that the application is not frozen, so a animation of some sort helps reassuring the user that the system is idle and well.
TODO: hide when connection failed.
